title: Been waiting for a complete day, have submitted a ticket, still no response.
body:
I've been getting frustrated, I've submitted a ticket, waiting 2-3 hours for one reply and which the reply did not help me at all. Is there any way I can get any fast help from Riot here?

I've been struggling with my update to 6.20; it stops at 33% and it gives me an error. Have tried the connection troubleshooting guide as well. Ticket still not been responded to.

replies.body: having the same problem, submitted a ticket yesterday, no response. I've done everything on every support article I can find from riot, every player-found solution, nothing is working for me. about to make my own post

I looked into your ticket and confirmed it's been successfully received.  It's in queue to our tech team who will help out as soon as possible.  In the meantime, it's really important to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities.  This is because you are receiving an error when the patcher is attempting to download files but failing to establish a connection.  Otherwise, we'll respond as soon as we can!

I have tried all of the methods and it does not work.

I just want some help that I could fix in like 5 minutes, it's ridiculous that I have to wait a day to fix a problem that will probably be fixed in 30 minutes.
